alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 3:45PM AKDT until March 23 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibilities reduced to one half mile or less. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of snow and blowing snow will continue across mainly interior parts of the Kuskokwim Delta as a low and trailing front continue to move inland and northeast. Conditions will then improve quickly behind the front as steady snow tapers to showers and as gusty winds diminish later this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
